name: journey of the soul
description:
Journey of the soul (formerly dian'ny fanahy) is an survival game where you guide a soul to escape from other evil spirits using audio input interaction and motion recognition, made during WOT gamejam 2021.

Gameplay
Move in front of the camera to guide the soul. Avoid collision with other souls (fanahy ratsy).

Some spirits can't be escaped. You must inhale them. Make noise to trigger the internal force (hery anaty) and inhale them. Make sure that you trigger the inner force excatly at the moment of collision otherwise you'll get injury

Requirement

  • webcam with audio input. (you cans use smarphone as webcam using droidcam app for example)
  • a graphic card that is DirectX11 or DirectX12 ready (that  supports compute shader)
